name: Rockerbaby High Waisted Skirt + Retro Top Set - Size 1-2
description:
Pin up her curls, put on the Mary-Jane's, you're all set for a fabulous fifties look in this very adorable polka dot and bambi deer outfit!
Featuring a cute retro halter top with elasticized back and a mini-version of our Miss Daisy Skirt, what's not to love!?

Size 1-2

name: Red Rose Ruffle Dress - Size 2
description:
Three gorgeous layers of ruffles in pretty roses, gingham and dots! This dress features an elasticized waist and neckline, which means even though it looks fancy, the fit is very comfortable and adjustable for the little wearer. Finished with cute sleeves and satin ribbon bow.

Size 2

name: Betty Bow Set - Size 2
description:
Absolutely adorable in wishy washy polka dots and a pretty pin-tucked blouse is this Betty Bow Set! Featuring an adjustable elastic waistband and oh-so-cute oversized bow, the softness and lightness of these shorts is amazing. For a truly vintage touch, we have teamed them with a perfectly pin-tucked little button up blouse so that this summery set will be the talk of the town.

Size 2

name: Tabitha Dress - Vintage Summer - Size 2
description:
You will love Tabitha because she is:

~ Chic & Fun 
~ Features gorgeous, tiny flutter sleeves 
~ the neckline is elasticized - easy wear & care
~ Has a big bow sash 
~ is in everyway the perfect summer dress!

Tabitha comes in a variety of colours & prints, this one being Vintage Summer

name: Jelly Bean Dress - Size 3
description:
The Jelly Bean Dress is a fun little summer sundress! With an elasticized back, halter neck tie and bright polka print, this little dress would be just perfect for days at the beach, afternoon parties, a trip to the shop and more! Pair over different colour t-shirts to change the look again and again! Includes a gorgeous hot pink ribbon sash.

Size 3

name: Flying Kites Dress in Honeycomb Size 6-7
description:
The Flying Kites Dress is the newest addition to the Robintail style rack! Featuring a very full skirt (shown off here to it's fullest advantage with a pettiskirt underneath), a darling peter pan collar and cap sleeves, this gorgeous dress would be just perfect for parties! The back does up prettily with handmade wooden buttons and features a ribbon sash that pulls in at the waist.

Size 5-6

Finished Length from back of neck: 57cm approx
Recommended Measurements:
Chest: 63cm
Waist: 56cm
Hip: 63cm

Pettiskirt available for separate sale.

name: Flying Kites Dress in Bouquet - Size 4-5
description:
The Flying Kites Dress is the newest addition to the Robintail style rack! Featuring a very full skirt (shown off here to it's fullest advantage with a pettiskirt underneath), a darling peter pan collar and cap sleeves, this gorgeous dress would be just perfect for parties! The back does up prettily with covered buttons and features a belt loop for the ribbon sash that pulls in at the waist.

Size 4-5

Chest: 55cm approx

name: Robintail Gift Certificate
description:
The perfect gift solution for your sister, bestie, new Mums, your daughter and mums-to-be! If you want to give some Robintail love but aren't quite sure what to choose, what size to get because of distance or baby isn't born yet or as an amazing baby shower gift, then a Robintail Gift Certificate is for you.

How it works:

Purchase your gift certificate via this listing. You can change the value and choose how much you want to spend using the quantity. Each quantity equals $5, so by adding 10x you can send a voucher worth $50 or by adding 5x you can send one worth $25.

The gift certificates are professionally designed and printed and come in a plain envelope so the voucher itself looks just as special as the gift you are giving!

The Gift Certificate will be shipped free of charge, and is valid for 12 months from the date of issue (the date of purchase) Vouchers cannot be redeemed for cash. The recipient will be able to choose from our website or contact us for a special order as is usual for all purchases. They will need to contact Robintail via e-mail to redeem their certificate - the voucher includes the instructions so no need for you to worry yourself with the little details!

Each voucher also receives a special unique handwritten code and signature on the back to ensure legitimacy.

name: Gracie Lou High Waisted Skirt & Peppermint Top Set
description:
Featuring our Gracie Lou High Waisted Skirt and Peppermint Top, this outfit is sure to turn heads this Christmas!

-------------------------------------------------------

The Peppermint top is a cute 50's inspired style with a peter pan collar. It Gracie Lou skirt or sweet over a simple pair of Betty Bow Pants. Closes at the back with pretty covered buttons & loops.

-------------------------------------------------------

Gracie Lou is reminiscent of days gone by when skirts were neither mini nor straight but full gathered affairs that required petticoats to hold them out!

With a gorgeous scalloped band at the front and adjustable elastic at the back, the Gracie Lou features a very full gathered skirt that hangs beautifully when tip-toeing around or swishes wonderfully when twirling around. For photos or just to get the authentic 50's look, pair with a pettiskirt - which works like a hoop skirt and holds the skirt out to it's full glory.

The back of the waistband also makes this skirt quite adjustable and allows room to grow. Little girls don't change a great deal in size around their waist so this pinny will fit until it's too short. A line of faux buttons down the front form a statement without the hassle of having to worry about coming undone!

So now you know it is the perfect skirt! Acres of fabric + Appropriate Twirly-whirly-ness + Vintage authenticity + Robintail

----------------------------------------------------------------------
Pettiskirt is available separately for $55.00
---------------------------------------------------------------------

Order now to receive this item mid-December!
Please state your size at checkout, choose between size 0-1, 2-3 or 4-5.

name: Petite Ballerina Set - Size 0-2 - Candy Princess
description:
Features a beautiful premium pettiskirt with a Robintail Top and Robintail Headband. Gorgeous designer set perfect for the holidays, photos or gifts!

Once off set. The entire set will fit size 0-2, making this set very adjustable!

description:

name: Parisian Ruffle Top & Short Set
description:
This gorgeous set is SO full of colour and bursting with vibrance! With the Eiffel Tower scattered among a beautiful floral print, lace and adorable polka print, this ensemble will delight almost anyone with a Parisian fetish and love of colour!

Size 0

name: Vintage Ruffle Dress - Size 2-3
description:
Vintage Style Ruffled Dress in a gorgeous shabby chic style print, with lace across the top and midway, which can be adjusted with a pretty ribbon. Stylish and comfortable for summer weather, the dress is elasticized around the ruffle and features a crocheted flower, pearl and doiley embellishment.

Size 2 - one only

name: Baby Boo Sundress + Bloomers Size 00
description: Robintail sundress + bloomer sets have been a hot seller this spring/summer! Crocheted lace hems the pretty sun-dress, with a peek-a-boo style back that allows for extra coolness and a glimpse of the cute matching bloomers. Cute covered buttons compliment the bodice.

name: Gelati Ruffled Bloomers
description:
Get your summer ruffle fix with multi-colours, hearts and sweet birds make up these stunning bloomers that are just like the bright coloured summer treat Gelati!

Need to match to a tee shirt or singlet? Add a brooch for $15, so you can put the ruffles with any bright coloured tee you like!
(please note brooch option does not include bloomers)

Made to order, choose from size 00 up to 3. Please allow 2-3 weeks for delivery.

name: Baby Bambi Sundress + Bloomer Set Size 000
description:
Robintail sundress + bloomer sets have been a hot seller this spring/summer! Crocheted lace hems the pretty sun-dress, with a peek-a-boo style back that allows for extra coolness and a glimpse of the cute matching bloomers. A pretty crocheted flower ribbon compliments the bodice.

Size 000

name: Polka Dot Babykini - Size 2-3
description:
She wore an..itsy bitsy teeny weeny polka dot babykini!
This gorgeous two piece set is just perfect for the warm, sunny days ahead. Whether you are heading for a beach picnic or a trip to the park, the Polka Dot Babykini is the cutest little outfit for any occasion.

Pop on a tee and wear with the bloomers for a different look.

Size 2-3 - once off set

name: Gelati Sundress + Bloomers Set
description:
Multi-colours, hearts and sweet birds make up this super summery set that is just like the bright coloured summer treat Gelati!

Our gorgeous sweetheart sundress, hemmed in lace with a peekaboo back meets gorgeous ruffles to create a match made in heaven.

Made to order, in sizes 00 up to 3, please allow 2-3 weeks for delivery. 

And if you want two looks in one, you can add a brooch for $15, so you can put the ruffles with any bright coloured tee you like!
(please note, the brooch option is for a brooch only and does not include the sundress or bloomers)

name: Confetti Babykini - Size 1 to 2
description:
Little girls will stay cool, calm and collected this summer thanks to the Confetti Babykini! With bright rainbow polka dots splashed across a white background and oh so cute truffle ruffles on the behind, this set is just geared for the 100% adorable factor!

Wear the bloomers with other coloured tee-shirts for an interchangeable summer look or the babykini top under a pair of overalls for a sweet style change.

100% cotton without fluffy trims or lace means she can wear it at the beach without a hassle - just throw it in the machine when you get home. 

Size 1-2

name: Baby Dot - Ruffled Top + Bloomer Set - Size 0
description:
The beautiful calm and earthy tones of these prints remind of me of the seaside in summer! Nothing is cuter than a ruffled top and matching bloomers and this set would definitely make a unique addition to any wardrobe.

Size 0

name: I'm A Little Teapot - Size 2
description:
This gorgeous swing top and shorts set is just the thing for summer! With pretty red and white polka dots, lace, bows and quaint teapots, what's not to love?

Features a swing top/dress with button and loop closure and matching shorts.

Size 2

name: Birds & Blossoms Peplum Dress - Size 6
description:
This gorgeous dress is perfect for spring! With beautiful birds, blossoms and butterflies sprinkled across a pale pink background, this dress is a must have addition to any girls wardrobe.

The peplum gathers mimic a skirt and top without the hassle. The back closes with a button and loop and the dress includes a white ribbon sash for added style.

Size 6 Ready to Ship

description:
Gracie Lou is reminiscent of days gone by when skirts were neither mini nor straight but full gathered affairs that required petticoats to hold them out!

With a gorgeous scalloped band at the front and adjustable elastic at the back, the Gracie Lou features a very full gathered skirt that hangs beautifully when tip-toeing around or swishes wonderfully when twirling around. For photos or just to get the authentic 50's look, pair with a pettiskirt - which works like a hoop skirt and holds the skirt out to it's full glory.

The back of the waistband also makes this skirt quite adjustable and allows room to grow. Little girls don't change a great deal in size around their waist so this pinny will fit until it's too short. A line of faux buttons down the front form a statement without the hassle of having to worry about coming undone!

So now you know it is the perfect skirt! Acres of fabric + Appropriate Twirly-whirly-ness + Vintage authenticity + Robintail

name: The Peppermint Top
description:
The Peppermint top is a cute 50's inspired style with a peter pan collar. It is a straight through blouse that looks gorgeous tucked into our Miss Daisy skirt or sweet over a simple pair of Betty Bow Pants. 

It does up at the back with a button and loop closure and is available in sizes 0-1, 2-3, 4-5, 6-7.

name: Miss Daisy - High Waisted Vintage Skirt
description:
The Miss Daisy is reminiscent of days gone by when skirts were neither mini nor straight but full gathered affairs that required petticoats to hold them out!

With a gorgeous scalloped band at the front and adjustable elastic at the back, the Miss Daisy features a very full gathered skirt that hangs beautifully when tip-toeing around or swishes wonderfully when twirling around. For photos or just to get the authentic 50's look, pair with a pettiskirt - which works like a hoop skirt and holds the skirt out to it's full glory.

The back of the waistband also makes this skirt quite adjustable and allows room to grow. Little girls don't change a great deal in size around their waist so this pinny will fit until it's too short.

Please allow 1-2 weeks for this item to be made and shipped.

name: The Pepper Top - Size 5-6
description:
The Pepper Top is sweet and stylish! Peter Pan Collar meets Peplum for a vintage mod look. Team with a skirt or cute shorts (picture here with the Robintail Betty Bow Pants) and she's good to go. In fact, it's so cute, you'll wish it came in your size!

Size 5-6

name: The Suspender Shorts & Dolly Top - Size 2-3
description:
Vintage lovers all round will not be able to get enough of these adorable, cute, adorable (yes, they really are that cute! it's not a typo) Robintail Suspender Shorts. In pretty pale pink linen they will be the talk of the town and go with just about anything - peter pan collar tops, stretch tees, singlets, even over swimmers!

The details: A flat front with faux handmade wooden buttons that I sourced locally from a craftsman, tie up suspender straps that are hooray! adjustable! and elasticized sides and back. Not to mention a bit of signature styling with cute elasticized lace ruffled pockets on either side for storing tiny treasures or lollies!

The Dolly Top is vintage sweetness itself! With a cute peplum, peter pan collar and cap sleeves, Dolly is perfect for a variety of occasions!

Size 2-3

name: Coco Chiffon Vintage Pinafore + Top Set - Size 4-5
description:
Coco and blush is a colour ensemble made in heaven and there is no exception with this stunning set.

The Pinafore:

Features high quality rare vintage style "Loopy" fabric, reminiscent of picnics, ice cream parlours and days gone by. The crossover suspender style straps and skirt feature handmade wooden buttons making it a breeze to put on over blouses and tops.

The Blouse:
Using layers of delicate chiffon and lace, this is a feminine and pretty blouse for all occasions. The flutter sleeves and sheerness of the fabric allow for a look that is as light as fairy wings! 

Both pieces are labelled with our exclusive High Society brand.

Size 4-5


*pettiskirt not available with this listing. Please contact us if you would like to purchase one separately.

name: The Robintail Pinafore
description:
It's a Robintail pinafore and it's perfect! It has all the pinaforish-ness that you would expect - the very full gathered skirt that hangs beautifully when tip-toeing around or swishes wonderfully when twirling around. For photos or just to get the authentic 50's look, pair with a pettiskirt - which works like a hoop skirt and holds the pinafore out to it's full glory.

The straps are adjustable in a pretty bow at the back! Hello gorgeous faux buttons on the front..no one will ever know! The back of the waistband also makes this pinafore quite adjustable and allows room to grow. Little girls don't change a great deal in size around their waist so this pinny will fit until it's too short.

So now you know it is the perfect pinny! Acres of fabric + Appropriate Twirly-whirly-ness + Vintage authenticity + Robintail

These pinafores are made to order, please choose your size
Petite (Size 0-1)
Small (2-4)
Medium (5-7)

Please allow 1-2 weeks for your order to be made and shipped.

Love the style but need a different colour? Contact me for a custom request!

*pettiskirt not included, please contact us if you would like to purchase one separately.

name: Honey Bird Dress Size 2-3
description:
Honey and Charcoal Black, delicate lace, peter pan collar, faux bow belt...need I say more? If you are after luxe designer style for your little girl then the Honey Bird is the dress for you!

Size 2-3

High Society Label.

name: Parasol Doll Dress Size 2-3
description:
This sweet dress with it's classic Peter Pan Collar and 50's style Parasol doll print are reminiscent of days gone by. Think picnics in the park, a Sunday drive or afternoon at the Ice-cream parlour, this pretty little frock is perfect for a number of spring outings!

Size 2

name: Mille-Fleur Dress Size 2-3
description: Sweet and stylish, this is the must have 'little black dress' for girls this spring. Sprinkled with tiny flowers, it's perfect for Sunday picnics, playdates in the park or the Spring race season! Finished elegantly with a decorative bib and bow bodice.

name: Sundress & Ruffled Bloomer Set - Made to Order
description:
This collection is called The Reindeers Picnic.
This year we have gone out of our way to solve a year around dilemma...
why buy a beautiful handmade garment if it can only be worn for a month?

We agreed! After all, the outfits will last way past then and of course be much too small the next year to wear. We understand, no, demand! That you still get top value out of our beautiful clothing.

So here we introduce our concept:
Red, Green and Silver but not as you know it! With a cute and cheerful print that is reminiscent of summer picnics, berry picking and more, these outfits will be good to go long after Christmas has past.

Our order list is fast piling up so to make these available we have released our Christmas 2013 a little earlier. Please allow 1-2 weeks for your order to be made. Please state your size at checkout - 000, 00, 0, 1, 2, or 3.

See our blog post about this collection here: http://robintail.blogspot.com.au/2013/08/the-reindeers-picnic.html

name: Vintage Babykini Size 000-00
description:
The Vintage Babykini is just the thing for Spring/Summer days! Perfect for playdates, keeping cool or happy days at the beach.

Size 000-00

name: Coco Lace Bambi Ruffled Playsuit - Size 0
description:
This gorgeous playsuit features coordinating red fabric and tulle ruffles topped with a beautiful crocheted lace and aqua bow. A stunning style and fabric combination that will set her apart in the crowd. Comfortable elastic waist, short legs and soft ribbon halter tie.

Size 0

name: Ruffled Nappy Cover - Chevron & Floral
description:
Gorgeous Ruffled Nappy Cover featuring three full gathered ruffles, satin bow and vintage crocheted lace - perfect for hiding unsightly nappies! Wear with tops, singlets, over leggings or under dresses!

Size 2

name: Retro Doll Singlet + Brooch - Size 1
description:
Gorgeous Retro Doll Applique on white singlet.
Includes Removable brooch.

name: Oh Darla! Ruffled Bloomers - Size 00
description:

Size 00

name: Bluebelle Ruffled Bloomers Size 000
description:
Gorgeous Robintail Ruffles feature three full gathered fabric ruffles and satin bow. Perfect for wearing with tops and dresses.

Size 000

name: Cherry Bomb Dress - Size 1-2
description:
Cuter than a peter pan collar and sweeter than cherries..we've put two and two together to make this adorable 50's inspired Cherry Bomb dress! With crocheted lace across the bodice, pretty pink bow and classic button and loop closure, what's not to love? The cherries are a heavier weight fabric, perfect for layering up this winter or running in the sunshine solo once the warmer months arrive. 

Size 1-2

name: Coco Lace Bambi Ruffled Playsuit - Size 1
description:
This gorgeous playsuit features coordinating red fabric and tulle ruffles topped with a beautiful crocheted lace and aqua bow. A stunning style and fabric combination that will set her apart in the crowd. Comfortable elastic waist, short legs and soft ribbon halter tie.

Size 1

name: Chevron Tunic Dress Size 4
description:
She steps out into the lane, wearing her lace tights, ballet flats and soft cardigan. The Chevron tunic peeps out from underneath the layers as she looks up at you with a mischievous grin and takes hold of your hand with her small pudgy one. It promises to be a fun day for Mummy and her darling at the park!

The Chevron tunic is made for little girls who love to dress up! With a bright cheery feel, the dress is elasticized around the waist and top so she can still run and dance with ease. Dress up with tights for winter or down with sandals and a picnic at the beach for summer!

Size 4

name: Bluebelle Tunic Dress - Size 2
description:
She steps out into the lane, wearing her red tights, ballet flats and soft cardigan. The Bluebelle tunic peeps out from underneath the layers as she looks up at you with a mischievous grin and takes hold of your hand with her small pudgy one. It promises to be a fun day for Mummy and her darling at the park!

The Bluebelle tunic is made for little girls who love to dress up! With a cute nautical feel, the dress is elasticized around the waist and top so she can still run and dance with ease. Dress up with tights for winter or down with sandals and a picnic at the beach for summer!

name: Sweet Floral Pintucked Pinafore - Size 2
description: In a gorgeous semi-tropical retro style floral, this adorable little pinafore is a must have addition to any girls wardrobe! Features cute crossover straps, comfortable elasticized waist, beautiful pin-tucked bib front and classic covered buttons. Pop over a tee and she's set to twirl and dance the day away!

name: Sugar Rose Tunic Dress - Size 0
description:
She steps out into the lane, wearing her pretty pink tights, ballet flats and soft cardigan. The Sugar Rose tunic peeps out from underneath the layers as she looks up at you with a mischievous grin and takes hold of your hand with her small pudgy one. It promises to be a fun day for Mummy and her darling at the park!

The Sugar Rose tunic is made for little girls who love to dress up! With a gorgeous victorian rose feel, the dress is elasticized around the waist and top so she can still run and dance with ease. Dress up with tights for winter or down with sandals and a picnic at the beach for summer!

Size 0

name: High Society - Pintucks & Pleats Vintage Set
description:
Peter pan collar, pin tucks and pleated linen pants - she's all set for that classic 40's look!

The Blouse:
Features amazingly soft to the touch European babushka print, pin-tucked front and chiffon peter pan collar. Vintage Crocheted lace edges the button up front, giving a delicate and feminine finish - ooh la la!

The Pants:
Features a high quality natural linen, waistband sash and pleats in front. These pants will required re-pressing after each wash and wear, due to their vintage styling and classic tailored finish. The back waistband is elasticized and adjustable. These pants are waist high and would best fit a petite to slender child as they are made to be fitted.

Both pieces are labelled with our exclusive High Society brand.

Size 4
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
High Society is inspired by the days of when little girls were dressed like little girls, had tea parties, teddy bear picnics and pushed dolly around in the pram. There were play clothes and there were party clothes, the Sunday best, a carefully buttoned coat and shiny Mary Jane shoes.

Born from a love of well made, tailored style and the softer tones of the vintage palette, High Society is for Mother’s wanting to add some nostalgia and high street charm to their little girls' wardrobe.

name: Peach Blossom Ruffled Bloomers
description:
Gorgeous Ruffled Peach Blossom Bloomers in a beautiful aqua and tangerine colour combination for Mum's looking for something not so pink to add to their little girls wardrobe! 

Our bloomers are not just another nappy cover, the ruffles are full, gathered and finished to perfection. The bloomers have a slight leg that come down that looks just a bit more stylish when out and about. Pair with a simple tee or let them peep out from underneath your favourite dress!

Available in size 000, 00-0, 1 or 2

name: High Society - Vinty Dress in Rose Size 1
description:
Pair with Mary-Janes and tights and you'll have a vintage look that no one else has!

The Vinty Dress in Rose:

With a double breasted button front in classic covered buttons featuring varying vintage prints, gathered skirt and satin bows, this a special little dress for any baby girl. A Peter Pan collar blouse or skivvy would look simply adorable peeping out underneath or worn solo it's a stunning style in it's own right.

Labelled with our exclusive High Society brand.

Size 1

--------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

High Society is inspired by the days of when little girls were dressed like little girls, had tea parties, teddy bear picnics and pushed dolly around in the pram. There were play clothes and there were party clothes, the Sunday best, a carefully buttoned coat and shiny Mary Jane shoes.

Born from a love of well made, tailored style and the softer tones of the vintage palette, High Society is for Mother’s wanting to add some nostalgia and high street charm to their little girls' wardrobe.

name: High Society - Betty Bow Pants + Bubble Top Size 2
description:
Linen, Lace and a stunning watercolour print..this chic set will be the talk of the next event your little miss steps out to!

Betty Bow Pants in Linen:

Features high quality linen with gorgeous crocheted lace and bow front for a classic vintage look. Not only do they look amazing with the Bubble top but they will match almost anything and be perfect for any occasion - just dress them up or down! Children's clothing should not only be stylish, but versatile. The back is elasticized with adjustable elastic so the pants can grow with her for optimum wear. 

Bubble Top:

It's light, floaty and looks amazing tucked in or out! The Bubble top is elasticized around the top so she can easily dress herself, dance and play in comfort and style! The watercolour designer print is amazingly soft to the touch and the detail has to be seen to be appreciated, with gold flecks and brush strokes more visible on a closer look.

Both pieces are labelled with our exclusive High Society brand.

Size 2

--------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

High Society is inspired by the days of when little girls were dressed like little girls, had tea parties, teddy bear picnics and pushed dolly around in the pram. There were play clothes and there were party clothes, the Sunday best, a carefully buttoned coat and shiny Mary Jane shoes.

Born from a love of well made, tailored style and the softer tones of the vintage palette, High Society is for Mother’s wanting to add some nostalgia and high street charm to their little girls' wardrobe.

name: Vintage Parasol Doll Pinafore - Size 2-3
description:

Features chiffon ruffled crossover straps, comfortable elasticized waist, beautiful pin-tucked bib front and gingham and lace bow. Pop over a tee and she's set to twirl and dance the day away!

name: Marie Antoinette - Luxe Ruffled Playsuit Size 0
description:
Marie Antoinette seemed an obvious choice as a name for this luxe ruffled playsuit! A style that is usually reserved only for special orders, we have made a select few available ready made for your next special celebration! With six ruffles of fabric and lace, beautiful trims and bows, this is luxe styling at it's best!

For a stunning winter look, layer over tights and skivvy, pair with a cardigan or stash away for the summer days ahead. Your little girl will be a head turner in this gorgeous playsuit!

"You Simply Don't have a Handmade Wardrobe if you Don't Have some Robintail!"

name: Coco Lace Bambi Dress
description:
What could be sweeter than bambi deer set out across the beautiful palette of coco and white polka dots paired with luxurious lace this winter?

A Robintail dress of course! This pretty little dress is a wardrobe staple for the cooler months. Layer with a cute cardi, long sleeved tee, tights and flats and you have a stunning winter look that will have everyone turning their heads!

The elasticized neckline makes this style very versatile, and it can be worn by a smaller size with a pretty tee underneath or can become a top when it is no longer long enough to be a dress.

name: Valentine Princess Party Dress - Size 2
description:
Balloons, Bows, White Socks & Mary Jane shoes all come to mind with this gorgeous party dress! Inspired by vintage styling, this pretty little number features a faux pinafore straps and ruffles to get the look without the hassle. In fluttery pink sweethearts, this dress will be sure to delight your little miss. The bodice is professionally lined and top stitched for a high quality finish, with a full gathered skirt hemmed in beautiful lace for twirling in! Features a pretty ribbon tie for the back.

This is a once off original design.

Size 2

name: Parisian Colour Pop Ruffled Playsuit - Size 1
description:
In the wind and the rain and the sun...this gorgeous collection is SO full of colour and bursting with vibrance! With the Eiffel Tower scattered among a beautiful floral print, lace and damask polka ruffles, this playsuit will delight almost anyone with a Parisian fetish and love of colour!

Size 1

name: Missy Owl Softie - Ruby
description:
These owl softies by Robintail are pretty as they are sweet! 
29cm high approx.

Handmade and Designed by Robintail in Sugar Rose fabrics, with lace, ribbons and embellishments to make them that bit special!

Love Robintail xo

name: Strawberry Teaparty Mini-Dress - Size 2
description:
This style is swinging and is just perfect for the warm weather! There is nothing worse than tight clothes in summer, and your little one will love running and playing in this breezy style!

Not only that, the roominess allows for layering if necessary and will see your little one through the seasons to come. As she grows, it will become a top and would look so cute with ruffled bloomers or denim shorts! Features an adorable curved bodice, button & loop closure with fluttery sleeves!


Love Robintail xo

name: Postage Options
description:
**These options are for Australian Residents only**

Option #1 - Signature on Delivery

Recommended for added security signature on delivery will be required.

Option #2 - Express Delivery

Recommended for fast delivery, receive your order within days. Next day delivery is only available in the Cairns and Atherton Tableland area. 

Option #3 - Insured

Signature on Delivery and Insurance up to the value of $200
